required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Balanced and Sustainable Diet Application for Insulin Resistance and Inflammation Marker of Obese People
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Balanced and Sustainable Diet for Insulin Resistance and Inflammation Marker of Obese Adults in Indonesia

brief_summary.textblock:
This study evaluates the effect of balanced and sustainable diet application on fat composition, insulin resistance and inflammation marker in obese people.
Intervention: Obese subject will receive intervention on balanced and sustainable diet application Control: Obese subject will receive a balanced diet application only

detailed_description.textblock:
Maintaining the adherence of weight loss programme while selecting healthy and sustainable foods will become a worldwide future challenge in nutrition. Therefore, we investigated the suitable content, graphic, and flow in developing a mobile application as an alternative solution for enhancing the compliance of weight control and selecting healthy food with the least environmental impact.
The treatment for obesity consists of dieting, physical exercise, pharmacology, and surgery. Restricted balanced diet is a well known diet recommendation for people with obesity. Sustainable diet is an alternative form of diet which contributes to healthy life and is protective of biodiversity.
The main challenge in obesity management is the sustainability of weight loss programme. Mobile apps are an alternative solution for enhancing compliance.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline at Day0 and endline at Day56
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline body weight at 8 weeks, is measured in kg

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline at Day0 and endline at Day56
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline Fat Mass at 8 weeks, is measured by body composition analyzer in kg

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline at Day0 and endline at Day56
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline Fasting plasma glucose at 8 weeks, is measured in mg/dL

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline at Day0 and endline at Day56
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline TNF alpha at 8 weeks, is measured in pg/ml

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline at Day0 and endline at Day56
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline Fasting Insulin at 8 weeks, is measured in µU/mL

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline at Day0 and endline at Day56
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline HOMA-IR at 8 weeks, is measured using formulation : glukosa (mg/dL) x insulin (µU/mL)/405

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline at Day0 and endline at Day56
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline Waist Circumference at 8 weeks, is measured in cm

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline at Day0 and endline at Day56
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline Carbohydrate intake at 8 weeks, is measured in gram using 24HR-recall

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline at Day0 and endline at Day56
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline Fat intake at 8 weeks, is measured in gram using 24HR-recall

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline at Day0 and endline at Day56
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline Protein intake at 8 weeks, is measured in gram using 24HR-recall

arm_group.description: The intervention group will receive menu recommendation of restriction calorie balanced and sustainable diet for 8 weeks. the control group will receive menu recommendation of balanced diet for 8 weeks. these menus are given in the apps

the intervention group receive get menu recommendation of restriction calorie balanced and sustainable diet for 8 weeks. the other group will receive menu recommendation of balanced diet for 8 weeks. these menus are given in the apps

intervention.description: the intervention group will get menu recommendation of restriction calorie balanced and sustainable diet for 8weeks. the other group will get menu recommendation of balanced diet for 8 weeks. these menus are given in the apps named EatsUp. the intervention group will get menu recommendation of restriction calorie balanced and sustainable diet for 8 weeks. the other group will get menu recommendation of balanced diet for 8 weeks. these menus are given in the apps named EatsUp.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Body mass index ≥ 25 kg/m2
- using Android-based smartphone
- willing to join this research by signing informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- pale in physical examination
- in weight loss program
- have obesity with comorbidities
- have hormonal diseases
- consumed hormonal drug, PTU, anti diabetes drug
- smoking or stop smoking under 2 years
- pregnant and breastfeeding women

responsible_party.investigator_title: Head of Human Nutrition Research Center
